content.question: Which of the following textual details best shows consistency in Mrs. Chandler’s character?

choices.label: “She was one of the best customers” (paragraph 4)
“there was the cemetery across the street” (paragraph 7)
“her own car . . . facing in the wrong direction” (paragraph 7)

content.answer: “her own car . . . facing in the wrong direction” (paragraph 7)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
